metaface.interaction
Class DMTLMemoryState

java.lang.Object
  metaface.interaction.DMTLMemoryState
class DMTLMemoryState
extends Object

DMTLMemoryState is a collection of state variables used in the DMTLMemoryParser

Version:
1.0
Author:
Simon Beard
See Also:
DMTLParser, DMTLTagReader
